entry.title: Changing what’s normal: how to transfer concepts between groups
entry.summary:
Description

This talk focuses on how to change people’s minds, and successfully introduce new concepts to groups and individuals without damaging relationships.

https://2019.pycon-au.org/talks/changing-whats-normal-how-to-transfer-concepts-between-groups

Sun Aug 4 10:30:00 2019 at C3.3

entry.title: International Cultural Bungles for Fun, Profit, and Sleeping At Night
entry.summary:
Description

This talk is about how to overcome the basic conflict and malaise that naturally occur in software teams working across countries, timezones, languages, cultural assumptions, hierachies, and professional backgrounds. Come for the war stories, stay for the one weird trick for avoiding meetings.
